about_the_game:
Welcome to Airport Manager, where your journey to building a world-class airport begins! Step into the shoes of an airport manager, and take control of every aspect of your very own airfield. From a humble grass runway and limited facilities, it’s up to you to transform your small airstrip into a thriving international hub.

Expand your airport by upgrading your facilities, decorating your terminal, and offering top-tier services. With every improvement, more planes and passengers will flock to your growing airport, boosting your reputation and income.

Key Features:

  • Manage Landing Requests: Pilots will request to land through your mail system—decide who gets permission and when.

  • Refueling and Baggage Handling: Ensure every plane is fully fueled and every passenger’s luggage is managed efficiently to keep operations running smoothly.

  • Grow Your Airport: Start small with basic services and a grass runway, then expand by upgrading runways, parking areas, refueling stations, and passenger amenities.

  • Earn Through Fees: Generate income from landing, parking, fuel, and handling fees to fund your airport’s growth.

  • Decorate and Upgrade: Attract more passengers and planes by purchasing items and placing them strategically to keep your airport looking top-notch.

  • Engaging Gameplay: Keep up with the demands of running an airport, from passenger check-ins to managing incoming flights and handling baggage.

The sky’s the limit in Airport Manager. Will you turn your small airstrip into a world-class travel hub? Start managing your airport today and take it to new heights!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10

short_description: In Airport Manager, you’re in charge of turning a small airstrip into a thriving airport! Manage landing requests, refuel planes, handle baggage, and upgrade your facilities to attract bigger aircraft and more passengers. Earn money, and grow your airport into a world-class hub.
